title: Electron–hole liquid in a van der Waals heterostructure photocell at room temperature
title_cn: 室温范德华异质结构光电池中的电子空穴液体
abstract: In semiconductors, photo-excited charge carriers exist as a gas of electrons and holes, bound electron–hole pairs (excitons), biexcitons and trions. At sufficiently high densities, the non-equilibrium system of electrons (e−) and holes (h+) may merge into an electronic liquid droplet. Here, we report on the electron–hole liquid in ultrathin MoTe2 photocells revealed through multi-parameter dynamic photoresponse microscopy (MPDPM). By combining rich visualization with comprehensive analysis of very large data sets acquired through MPDPM, we find that ultrafast laser excitation at a graphene–MoTe2–graphene interface leads to the abrupt formation of ring-like spatial patterns in the photocurrent response as a function of increasing optical power at T = 297 K. The sudden onset to these patterns, together with extreme sublinear power dependence and picosecond-scale photocurrent dynamics, provide strong evidence for the formation of a two-dimensional electron–hole liquid droplet. The electron–hole liquid, which features a macroscopic population of correlated electrons and holes, may offer a path to room-temperature optoelectronic devices that harness collective electronic phenomena.
abstract_cn: 在半导体中，光激发的电荷载流子以电子和空穴，结合的电子空穴对（激子），双激子和三子的气体形式存在。在足够高的密度下，电子（e ＆＃8722; ）和空穴（h + ）的非平衡系统可能会合并成电子液滴。在这里，我们报告通过多参数动态光响应显微镜（MPDPM）揭示的超薄MoTe 2 光电电池中的电子空穴液体。通过将丰富的可视化与对通过MPDPM采集的超大型数据集的全面分析相结合，我们发现在石墨烯MoTe 2 ＆＃8211;石墨烯界面处的超快激光激发会导致环的突然形成光电流响应中的类似类空间图案是随着T＆amp; K = 297的光功率增加的函数。这些模式的突然发作，加上极端的亚线性功率依赖性和皮秒级的光电流动力学，为形成二维电子空穴液滴提供了有力的证据。具有大量相关电子和空穴的宏观特征的电子空穴液体可能为通向集体电子现象的室温光电器件提供一条途径。

title: Breaking crosstalk limits to dynamic holography using orthogonality of high-dimensional random vectors
title_cn: 使用高维随机向量的正交性打破动态全息的串扰限制
abstract: Holography is the most promising route to true-to-life three-dimensional (3D) projections, but the incorporation of complex images with full depth control remains elusive. Digitally synthesized holograms, which do not require real objects to create a hologram, offer the possibility of dynamic projection of 3D video. Despite extensive efforts aimed at 3D holographic projection, however, the available methods remain limited to creating images on a few planes, over a narrow depth of field or with low resolution. Truly 3D holography also requires full depth control and dynamic projection capabilities, which are hampered by high crosstalk. The fundamental difficulty is in storing all the information necessary to depict a complex 3D image in the 2D form of a hologram without letting projections at different depths contaminate each other. Here, we solve this problem by pre-shaping the wavefronts to locally reduce Fresnel diffraction to Fourier holography, which allows the inclusion of random phase for each depth without altering the image projection at that particular depth, but eliminates crosstalk due to the near-orthogonality of large-dimensional random vectors. We demonstrate Fresnel holograms that form on-axis with full depth control without any crosstalk, producing large-volume, high-density, dynamic 3D projections with 1,000 image planes simultaneously, improving the state of the art for the number of simultaneously created planes by two orders of magnitude. Although our proof-of-principle experiments use spatial light modulators, our solution is applicable to all types of holographic media.
abstract_cn: 全息照相术是逼真的三维（3D）投影的最有前途的途径，但是将复杂的图像与完整的深度控制结合起来仍然遥不可及。不需要真实物体即可创建全息图的数字合成全息图，提供了动态投影3D视频的可能性。尽管针对3D全息投影进行了广泛的努力，但是，可用的方法仍然仅限于在几个平面上，狭窄的景深或低分辨率上创建图像。真正的3D全息技术还需要完整的深度控制和动态投影功能，这些功能会受到高串扰的影响。基本的困难在于以全息图的2D形式存储描述复杂的3D图像所需的所有信息，而又不让不同深度的投影相互污染。在这里，我们通过对波前进行预成形以将菲涅耳衍射局部减少到傅立叶全息术来解决此问题，这允许在不改变特定深度的图像投影的情况下为每个深度包含随机相位，但是消除了由于接近正交而产生的串扰大尺寸随机向量的集合。我们演示了菲涅耳全息图，这些菲涅耳全息图可在没有任何串扰的情况下进行全深度控制而在轴上形成，同时生成具有1000个图像平面的大容量，高密度，动态3D投影，从而将同时创建的平面数量提高了两个水平数量级。尽管我们的原理验证实验使用空间光调制器，但我们的解决方案适用于所有类型的全息介质。

title: Super-resolution retinal imaging using optically reassigned scanning laser ophthalmoscopy
title_cn: 使用光学分配扫描激光检眼镜的超高分辨率视网膜成像
abstract: Super-resolution optical microscopy techniques have enabled the discovery and visualization of numerous phenomena in physics, chemistry and biology. However, the highest resolution super-resolution techniques depend on nonlinear fluorescence phenomena and are thus inaccessible to the myriad applications that require reflective imaging. One promising super-resolution technique is optical reassignment, which so far has only shown potential for fluorescence imaging at low speeds. Here, we present novel advances in optical reassignment to adapt it for any scanning microscopy, including reflective imaging, and enable an order of magnitude faster image acquisition than previous optical reassignment techniques. We utilized these advances to implement optically reassigned scanning laser ophthalmoscopy, an in vivo super-resolution human retinal imaging device not reliant on confocal gating. Using this instrument, we achieved high-resolution imaging of living human retinal cone photoreceptor cells (determined by minimum foveal eccentricity) without adaptive optics or chemical dilation of the eye.
abstract_cn: 超高分辨率光学显微镜技术使人们能够发现和可视化物理学，化学和生物学领域的众多现象。但是，最高分辨率的超分辨率技术取决于非线性荧光现象，因此对于需要反射成像的多种应用程序来说是无法实现的。光学重新分配是一种很有前途的超分辨率技术，迄今为止，光学重新分配仅显示出低速荧光成像的潜力。在这里，我们提出了光学重新分配的新进展，以使其适用于任何扫描显微镜，包括反射成像，并且与以前的光学重新分配技术相比，能够使图像获取速度提高一个数量级。我们利用这些进展来实施光学重新分配的扫描激光检眼镜，这是一种不依赖共焦选通的体内超高分辨率人类视网膜成像设备。使用该仪器，我们可以对活的人视网膜锥型感光细胞进行高分辨率成像（由最小的中心凹偏心率确定），而无需进行自适应光学或眼睛的化学扩张。

title: Dual-energy electron beams from a compact laser-driven accelerator
title_cn: 紧凑型激光驱动加速器产生的双能电子束
abstract: Ultrafast pump–probe experiments open the possibility to track fundamental material behaviour, such as changes in electronic configuration, in real time. To date, most of these experiments are performed using an electron or a high-energy photon beam that is synchronized to an infrared laser pulse. Entirely new opportunities can be explored if not only a single, but multiple synchronized, ultrashort, high-energy beams are used. However, this requires advanced radiation sources that are capable of producing dual-energy electron beams, for example. Here, we demonstrate simultaneous generation of twin-electron beams from a single compact laser wakefield accelerator. The energy of each beam can be individually adjusted over a wide range and our analysis shows that the bunch lengths and their delay inherently amount to femtoseconds. Our proof-of-concept results demonstrate an elegant way to perform multi-beam experiments in the future on a laboratory scale.
abstract_cn: 超快泵的探针实验为实时跟踪基本材料性能（例如电子配置的变化）提供了可能性。 迄今为止，大多数这些实验都是使用与红外激光脉冲同步的电子或高能光子束进行的。 如果不仅使用单个同步光束，而且使用多个同步的超短高能光束，就可以探索全新的机遇。 然而，这需要例如能够产生双能量电子束的高级辐射源。 在这里，我们演示了从单个紧凑型激光尾波加速器同时生成双电子束。 每个光束的能量可以在很宽的范围内进行单独调节，我们的分析表明，束的长度及其延迟本质上是飞秒。 我们的概念验证结果展示了一种将来在实验室规模上进行多光束实验的绝妙方法。

title: A 90-nm-thick graphene metamaterial for strong and extremely broadband absorption of unpolarized light
title_cn: 一种90纳米厚的石墨烯超材料，可强力且极宽地吸收非偏振光
abstract: Broadband strong light absorption of unpolarized light over a wide range of angles in a large-area ultrathin film is critical for applications such as photovoltaics, photodetectors, thermal emitters and optical modulators. Despite long-standing efforts in design and fabrication, it has been challenging to achieve all these desired properties simultaneously. We experimentally demonstrate a 12.5 cm2, 90-nm-thick graphene metamaterial with approximately 85% absorptivity of unpolarized, visible and near-infrared light covering almost the entire solar spectrum (300–2,500 nm). The metamaterial consists of alternating graphene and dielectric layers; a grating couples the light into waveguide modes to achieve broadband absorption over incident angles up to 60°. The very broad spectral and angular responses of the absorber are ideal for solar thermal applications, as we illustrate by showing heating to 160 °C in natural sunlight. These devices open a novel approach to applications of strongly absorbing large-area photonic devices based on two-dimensional materials.
abstract_cn: 大面积超薄薄膜在宽角度范围内对未偏振光的宽带强光吸收对于光伏，光电检测器，热发射器和光学调制器等应用至关重要。尽管在设计和制造方面进行了长期的努力，但是要同时实现所有这些所需的特性一直是挑战。我们通过实验证明了厚度为12.5＆＃8201; 2 2 ，厚度为90 nm的石墨烯超材料，其非偏振，可见光和近红外光的吸收率约为85％，几乎覆盖了整个太阳光谱（300＆＃8211 ; 2,500＆＃8201; nm）。超材料由交替的石墨烯层和介电层组成。光栅将光耦合到波导模式中，以在高达60的入射角上实现宽带吸收。吸收器的非常宽的光谱和角度响应非常适合太阳热应用，正如我们通过显示在自然阳光下加热到160°C所说明的那样。这些器件为基于二维材料的强吸收大面积光子器件的应用开辟了新途径。

title: Dual-band infrared imaging using stacked colloidal quantum dot photodiodes
title_cn: 使用堆叠的胶体量子点光电二极管的双波段红外成像
abstract: Infrared multispectral imaging is attracting great interest with the increasing demand for sensitive, low-cost and scalable devices that can distinguish coincident spectral information. However, the widespread use of such detectors is still limited by the high cost of epitaxial semiconductors. In contrast, the solution processability and wide spectral tunability of colloidal quantum dots (CQDs) have inspired various inexpensive, high-performance optoelectronic devices. Here, we demonstrate a two-terminal CQD dual-band detector, which provides a bias-switchable spectral response in two distinct bands. A vertical stack of two rectifying junctions in a back-to-back diode configuration is created by engineering a strong and spatially stable doping process. By controlling the bias polarity and magnitude, the detector can be rapidly switched between short-wave infrared and mid-wave infrared at modulation frequencies up to 100 kHz with D* above 1010 jones at cryogenic temperature. The detector performance is illustrated by dual-band infrared imaging and remote temperature monitoring.
abstract_cn: 随着对能够区分一致光谱信息的灵敏，低成本和可扩展设备的需求不断增长，红外多光谱成像引起了人们极大的兴趣。然而，这种检测器的广泛使用仍然受到外延半导体的高成本的限制。相反，胶体量子点（CQD）的溶液可加工性和宽光谱可调谐性激发了各种廉价，高性能的光电器件。在这里，我们演示了一个两端CQD双频带检测器，该检测器在两个不同的频带中提供了可偏置切换的频谱响应。通过设计强大且空间稳定的掺杂工艺，可以创建背靠背二极管配置的两个整流结的垂直堆叠。通过控制偏置极性和幅度，可以在D *大于10 10 ＆＃8201的调制频率下以高达100＆＃8201kHz的调制频率在短波红外和中波红外之间快速切换。低温下的琼斯。双波段红外成像和远程温度监测可以说明探测器的性能。

title: Optically controlling the emission chirality of microlasers
title_cn: 光学控制微激光器的发射手性
abstract: Orbital angular momentum (OAM) carried by helical light beams is an unbounded degree of freedom that offers a promising platform in modern photonics. So far, integrated sources of coherent light carrying OAM are based on resonators whose design imposes a single, non-tailorable chirality of the wavefront (that is, clockwise or counterclockwise vortices). Here we propose and demonstrate the realization of an integrated microlaser where the chirality of the wavefront can be optically controlled. Importantly, the scheme that we use, based on the optical breaking of time-reversal symmetry in a semiconductor microcavity, can be extended to different laser architectures, thus paving the way to the realization of a new generation of OAM microlasers with tunable chirality.
abstract_cn: 螺旋光束所携带的轨道角动量（OAM）是无限的自由度，为现代光子学提供了一个有希望的平台。 到目前为止，相干光传输OAM的集成光源是基于谐振器的，该谐振器的设计强加了波前的单个，不可定制的手征（即，顺时针或逆时针旋涡）。 在这里，我们提出并演示了集成微激光器的实现，其中可以对波前的手性进行光学控制。 重要的是，基于半导体微腔中时间反转对称性的光学破坏，我们使用的方案可以扩展到不同的激光架构，从而为实现具有可调手性的新一代OAM微激光器铺平了道路。 / p>

title: Self-stabilizing photonic levitation and propulsion of nanostructured macroscopic objects
title_cn: 纳米结构宏观物体的自稳定光子悬浮和推进
abstract: Light is a powerful tool to manipulate matter, but existing approaches often necessitate focused, high-intensity light that limits the manipulated object’s shape, material and size. Here, we report that self-stabilizing optical manipulation of macroscopic—millimetre-, centimetre- and even metre-scale—objects could be achieved by controlling the anisotropy of light scattering along the object’s surface. In a scalable design that features silicon resonators on silica substrate, we identify nanophotonic structures that can self-stabilize when rotated and/or translated relative to the optical axis. Nanoscale control of scattering across a large area creates restoring behaviour by engineering the scattered phase, without needing to focus incident light or excessively constrain the shape, size or material composition of the object. Our findings may lead to platforms for manipulating macroscopic objects, with applications ranging from contactless wafer-scale fabrication and assembly, to trajectory control for ultra-light spacecraft and even laser-propelled light sails for space exploration.
abstract_cn: 光是操纵物质的强大工具，但是现有的方法通常需要聚焦的高强度光，以限制被操纵物体的形状，材料和大小。在这里，我们报告说，通过控制沿物体表面的光散射各向异性，可以实现宏观，毫米，厘米甚至米尺度的物体的自稳定光学操作。在具有可伸缩性的设计中，在二氧化硅衬底上具有硅谐振器，我们确定了纳米光子结构，当相对于光轴旋转和/或平移时它们可以自稳定。通过对散射相进行工程设计，可以对大面积散射进行纳米级控制，从而恢复性能，而无需聚焦入射光或过度限制物体的形状，大小或材料成分。我们的发现可能会导致操纵宏观物体的平台，其应用范围从非接触晶圆规模的制造和组装，到超轻型航天器甚至是用于太空探索的激光推进的光帆的轨迹控制。
